library(tidyverse)

## Problem 2
```{r}
mu = c(1,2,3,4,5,6)

sim_mean_sd = function(n, mu = 0, sigma = 50) {
  
  sim_data = tibble(
    x = rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma),
  )
  
  sim_data |> 
    summarize(
      mu_hat = mean(x),
      sigma_hat = sd(x)
    )
}

output = vector("list", 100)

for (i in 1:5000) {
  output[[i]] = sim_mean_sd(30)
}

sim_results = bind_rows(output)

sim_results_df = 
  expand_grid(
    sample_size = 30,
    iter = 1:5000
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    estimate_df = map(sample_size, sim_mean_sd)
  ) |> 
  unnest(estimate_df)
```
